component.name: Gameyfin Desktop
component.summary: A dedicated desktop client for Gameyfin

description.p: Gameyfin Desktop is a dedicated desktop client for Gameyfin that wraps the web interface in a standalone application for a more integrated experience.

ul.li: Dedicated Desktop Application: Runs Gameyfin in its own window, separate from your web browser.
Persistent SSO Login: Supports persistent logins with SSO providers. The application saves your session data, so you only have to log in once.
System Tray Integration: Includes an icon in the system tray for quickly showing, hiding, or quitting the application.
Integrated Settings: Configure your Gameyfin URL, SSO host, window dimensions, and more directly within the app.
Download Manager: Manages all file downloads in a persistent "Downloads" tab, showing progress, speed, and history.
Prompts for per-install environment configuration (Wayland, GameID, Store, etc.).
Extracts the downloaded archive and detects .exe files.
Automatically looks up the umu-id for proton fixes.
Automatically creates a wineprefix and launches the installer using umu-run.
Quick access to winecfg and winetricks for manual prefix configuration.
Integrated Shortcut Management: Automatically detects shortcuts created by the installer and allows you to add them to your Desktop and Application Menu.
Fixed SSO host parsing to support ports and multiple hosts
